name: Vintage Salvatore Ferragamo Purple Suede Heels
description:
Vintage Purple Heels from the 1980s. Made by Ferragamo. Royal purple suede with suede bow.


Women's size 8.5 AA (width)
Measures 
9.5 inches heel to toe inside footbed
10.5 inches from heel to toe outersole
2 inch heel
2.5 inches across ball of foot

In good vintage condition-- some wear and some scuffs in fabric
The bottom of the heel where a plastic heel protector should be but it is missing on both shoes. It's only about about $6.00 to replace plastic heel protectors. 

Please don't hesitate to convo me with any questions you have.
